name: Deadsigns
description:
DeadSigns is a survival/horror first person experience. It's a single player game and it's actively in development.

Challenge others players and reach the top score on STEAM's plateform! For that, survive as long as possible and defend your cabin's chest.. But against what ? That’s what you’ll find out by nightfall...
During the day, find materials to craft weapons/ traps, and also to barricade your cabin. Now, show us your skill !

The game is translated in 3 languages : English, French and Corsican.
After the release of this Forest game mode, we'll focus on adding new contents (weapons, traps, monsters and surprises...). We also provide to create others fun games mode, a multiplayer option, and a great campaign. We work hard to reach these goals. We count on your support !

DeadSignsTeam
